revised_title: An Investigation into the Healing Properties of Springs and Waters
tldr: The author explores the properties of healing springs and waters, examining their effects on the human body and their potential to treat various ailments. They discuss the role of minerals, water chemistry, and other factors in the healing process, and provide examples of healing springs in England. The author also investigates the role of friction and pressure in the healing process and the potential for water to be separated from its healing properties.
